description: The average temperature in the region reached a record high in some area, EU data shows.
title: Siberian Arctic 'up to 10 degrees warmer' in June
title_page: Siberian Arctic 'up to 10 degrees warmer' in June - BBC News
maintext: It is one of the key drivers of global weather systems, he says. So, if you change the weather in the Arctic you are likely to see the effects ripple out around the world.
